title: Cyber bullying : common types of bullying 2019 , by gender
summary: This statistic shows the number of sick leave days u.s. adults took last year as of 2017 , by gender . It was found that 27 percent of male respondents and 26 percent of female respondents did not take any sick leave days .

data.Response: I have been cyber bullied (previous 30 days)
I have cyber bullied others (previous 30 days)
